Who shares your views?

On October 27th, 2014, Toronto will choose a new mayor to represent itself to the world.

As residents of this great city, we recognize that what makes us great, is something that should be reflected in our leaders.

This site will enable you to select what values are important to you and view what candidates have released campaign promises that are aligned with what you care about.

In no way, is this affiliated with any candidate or political party. This is simply a tool to help you make an informed decision on election day.

Toronto 2014

What's Important to you?
